resp = client.search(
    index="ip_addresses",
    size=10,
    aggs={
        "ip_ranges": {
            "ip_range": {
                "field": "ip",
                "ranges": [
                    {
                        "to": "10.0.0.5"
                    },
                    {
                        "from": "10.0.0.5"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
